text: DD Goa is a bi-lingual Indian state owned terrestrial television station operated by public service broadcaster Doordarshan. Formerly known as DD Panaji, it is Doordarshan's regional television station broadcasting from Panaji, the capital city of Indian state of Goa. The programmes are broadcast in Konkani and Marathi languages. The channel is available on Doordarshan's DTH platform DD Free Dish. ==References== Category:Hindi-language television channels in India Category:Television channels and stations established in 1990 Category:Hindi-language television stations Category:Television stations in Goa Category:1990 establishments in India Category:Doordarshan Category:Konkani-language television stations
title: DD Goa
